scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/package.js && rollup -g d3-scale:d3_scale,d3-selection:d3_selection -f umd -n d3_x3dom_axis -o build/d3-x3dom-axis.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-x3dom-axis.js -c -m -o build/d3-x3dom-axis.min.js && rm -f build/d3-x3dom-axis.zip && zip -j build/d3-x3dom-axis.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-x3dom-axis.js build/d3-x3dom-axis.min.js
